SEARCH
Package ru.introguzzle.parsers.json.mapping.reference

Class StandardCircularReferenceStrategies

java.lang.Object
ru.introguzzle.parsers.json.mapping.reference.StandardCircularReferenceStrategies
public final class StandardCircularReferenceStrategies extends Object
A utility class providing standard strategies for handling circular references during JSON mapping.

This class contains predefined implementations of CircularReferenceStrategy that specify how to handle circular references when serializing objects to JSON. Circular references occur when an object references itself directly or indirectly, which can lead to infinite loops during serialization.

  • Field Details

    • PLACEHOLDER

      public static final String PLACEHOLDER
      A placeholder string used to represent a duplicate reference in the JSON output.

      This placeholder is used by the USE_PLACEHOLDER strategy to indicate that a circular reference has been detected. It replaces the actual object with this string in the serialized JSON.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • THROW_EXCEPTION

      public static final CircularReferenceStrategy THROW_EXCEPTION
      A circular reference strategy that throws a CircularReferenceException when a circular reference is detected.

      When this strategy is used, encountering a circular reference during serialization will result in an exception, preventing the serialization process from completing. This is useful when circular references are not expected and should be treated as errors.

    • USE_SPECIAL_OBJECT

      public static final CircularReferenceStrategy USE_SPECIAL_OBJECT
      A circular reference strategy that uses a special object to represent circular references.

      When this strategy is used, circular references are replaced with instances of StandardCircularReferenceStrategies.CircularReference, which wrap the original object. This allows the serialization process to continue, and the circular reference can be handled or recognized in the output.

    • USE_PLACEHOLDER

      public static final CircularReferenceStrategy USE_PLACEHOLDER
      A circular reference strategy that uses a placeholder string to represent circular references.

      When this strategy is used, circular references are replaced with the PLACEHOLDER string. This allows the serialization process to continue, and the circular reference is indicated by the placeholder in the output.
